definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: exact mng. uncertain; prob. (from context) abhor, spurn (De comp. Ar. n0r abhor, but this is med. w);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. subj. ´[[י]], [[נִאֵר]] La 2:7 (obj. [[מִקְדָּשׁוֹ]]; ‖[[זׇנַת]]); 2 ms. [[נֵאַרְתָּה]] Ps 89:40 (obj. [[בְּרית עַבְדְְּ]]; ‖[[חִלֵּל]], and [[זׇנַח]], [[מָאַס]] v:Ps 89:39; doubts cast on text by Hup (reading [[נאץ]]), Now, Bu:La 2:1).
